title: Available 1x1 Apartment Home near Downtown Concord move in special
posting_body: ['Live with beauty and serenity', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x135', '$2,314 - $2,567', '.', '1 Bed 1 Bath .', '600 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 220 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 214 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 108 - Available', 'Now', 'Clayton Gardens', 'Address:', '4220 Clayton Rd Concord, CA 94521', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Discover what comfortable living is all about in this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment at Clayton Gardens!', 'Take a tour around the premises, and you’ll immediately see that the spacious floor plan layout accommodates your furniture and other personal belongings.', 'Staying indoors is now more comfortable with the air conditioning and ceiling fans.', 'Numerous storage options are strategically located to keep your home in order.', 'Cooking will be effortless in the kitchen by means of the walk-in pantry that keeps your counters clutter free.', 'You can end each day by unwinding on the patio.', 'This pet-friendly community has a fitness center to keep you active.', 'A covered parking area takes good care of your vehicle.', 'With all these perks, this home will be occupied soon, so pick up that phone and book a tour today!', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', '12 month lease', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x135', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Get $1000 off your first month rent when you lease with in 48 hours of your tour at Clayton Gardens.']
